document_data.name: Geirildin Sethomiir
document_data.mainbody:
'''Geirildin Sethomiir''' was the [[coronal]] of the [[Ilythiir|Ilythiiri]] house [[Sethomiir]]. He was a [[dark elf]] and powerful mage during the time of the [[Crown Wars]].

He summoned the [[balor]] [[Wendonai]] in {{Yearlink|-11500}} to help him against the [[Aryvandaar]]i and to help him in achieving a leading position among the other dark elven clans. Ultimately, this drove the dark elves into the arms of [[Lolth]] and was one of the causes for their so-called Descent.
